title: Powerslide for PC
material_description: CD-ROM videogame. CD-ROM in CD jewel case with insert and manual
brief_description: After an environmental holocaust killed 98% of the world’s population, the survivors above ground turned to modifying and racing the cars left over in the ruins of civilization. In the ruined world of Powerslide, players race through abandoned cities buried in sand, ruins of a dam, abandoned mine shafts, and other desolate landscapes. Perform death-defying jumps and slide through the corners as you eke out each win! This racing sim has full car dynamics, force feedback, and full multiplayer support.
